entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
